title: Rammus Flare Jeans for Women Crossover High Waisted Bell Bottom Jeans Trendy Yoga Pants Stretchy Flare Leggings with Pockets
description: Buttery-Soft and Four-Way Stretch: The butter-soft fabric hugging your skin like a cloud, offering ultimate comfy and flexibility. Four-way stretch fabric offers ease of movement and durable wearability，iterally like wearing yoga pants
Sleek Crossover Waist: High waist designs that offer support and comfort, without sacrificing on style. A crossover design for a simple yet stylish touch that will make you stand out in any crowd

Enhance Curves: Rammus Flare Jeans are design with a Lifted Butt and flared legs that sculpt your booty to perfection. Slimming appearance to the legs and lengthen look of heights, giving you that head-turning curve and a confidence boost like no other

Four Practical Pockets: Flare Jeans featuring two side and two back pockets for storing your essentials such as credit cards or other small items when you're on the go. Say goodbye to handbag juggling

Versatile: The flare jeans for women are crafted with amazing stretchy fabric, perfect for dressing up or down, making them suitable for work, daily wear, school, yoga, dancing and more. No one can tell how comfortable you are except for your smile
